component.name: Print(Notes)
component.summary: A markdown notes app inspired by Google Keep and Obsidian

description.p: Print(Notes) is an open source markdown notes app, inspired by the look of Google Keep and functionality of Dynalist's Obsidian. All notes and folders are stored locally on the device, without needing a connection to the cloud!

Features Include:
Ultimate customizability
Many themes for light and dark mode
Create your own custom color themes
Change note display layout (Grid, List, Tree views)
Supports Markdown and LaTeX formatting - Includes basic Image and PDF viewers
